EmailTemplate.name: FW: The edited agreement from Mary looked ok to me. And you? (1344030333.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: The edited agreement from Mary looked ok to me. And you? (1344030333.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jim, Please disregard my last email. I am leaving the office and sent Mary the work order for her to complete, you may just forward to signed contract to her and copy me. Have a great weekend,Nicolette From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Friday, August 03, 2012 3:36 PM To: 'Jim Sasena' Subject: RE: The edited agreement from Mary looked ok to me. And you? Hi Jim, Please see the attached contract for your signature. If you could actually send it back to me once you sign that would be great, I want to send the contract and the work order at the same time back to Mary. Thanks! From: Jim Sasena [mailto:jim@sasena.com] <mailto:[mailto:jim@sasena.com]> Sent: Friday, August 03, 2012 12:06 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: The edited agreement from Mary looked ok to me. And you? Nicloette, And thanks for your involvement. I am waiting for your ok for me to sign. Jim
